Table of Contents

Name

reb_viewer - view a REBOUND SimulationArchive

Synopsis

reb_viewer [parameter=value]

Description

reb_viewer views REBOUND SimulationArchive (RSA) in a browser app, typically pointed to by the URL http://localhost:1234/, but see server=. Once loaded the following keys are active: 
 Right arrow: jump to next snapshot
 Left arrow:  jump to previous snapshot
 Page down:   jump 10 snapshots foward
 Page up:     jump 10 snapshots backward
 Home key:    jump to first snapshot
 End key:     jump to last snapshot

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in order; they may be given in any order if the keyword is also given. Use --help to confirm this man page is up to date.
in=
input SimulationArchive. No default.
server=port
The port number used for the app. Default: 1234

See Also

s2reb(1NEMO) , reb2s(1NEMO) , reb_integrate(1NEMO) , snapshot(5NEMO) , rebound(8NEMO) , glnemo2(1NEMO) , snapplot(1NEMO) 
https://rebound.readthedocs.io - REBOUND documentation
